Wheel (\*.whl): Bundles code into single file which can be installed with pip
PEX (and others): Bundles code + Python dependencies into a single, executable file
System package ( e.g. rpm, deb, brew): System library package which includes code and references to other system packages
Conda: Combines Python and system packages (except OSâ€™ standard C library) into one package system
Self contained executable (e.g. PyInstal: Self-contained executable that includes all dependencies except external C libraries
Container image (e.g. Docker): Complete, isolated filesystem which includes everything to run the application
